name: Amazon EC2 Down & Service Shortage
caption: egypt-webdesign.com
description: Today is a horrible day for Amazon! Most of the big Social websites like Reddit, pinterest, Foursquare, Heroku and much more than you can imagine are down! because their Amazon Elastic Cloud Compute (EC2) is down and having a Service Shortage.
